name: com.aukilabs.unity.manna
description: The Manna module enables devices to establish their pose in another device's Session by scanning a Lighthouse (QR code) on the screen of the other device.

samples.description: A demo project that showcases basic Manna functionality - displaying a dynamic lighthouse and performing Instant Calibration from one.
A demo project that showcases a custom implementation of the Manna OnLighthouseTracked callback.
A demo project that showcases Instant Calibration from a static lighthouse.
